Package com.intellij.openapi.vcs.ui

Interface Refreshable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CheckinChangeListSpecificComponent, CheckinProjectPanel, RefreshableOnComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdditionalOptionsPanel, GitCheckinEnvironment.GitCheckinOptions, HgCheckinEnvironment.HgCommitAdditionalComponent

    public interface Refreshable
    Base interface for user interface objects which can be refreshed and can save/restore their state.
